lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Wilson introduced the exemption shortly after taking office in 1984 as a a way of stimulating investment, but it was sharply criticized by the opposition as over-generous to wealthy investors.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Finance Minister Michael Wilson unveiled a wide-ranging reform of the personal tax system that includes limiting the capital gains exemption and a sharp cut in the dividend tax credit.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Wilson said tax treatment for registered retirement savings plan contributions will be maintained but the phase in of the increase in the maximum limit to 15,500 dlrs will be delayed four years to 1994.
